public class BorderPage extends Page
Provides a page border template. This Page returns the template "border-template.htm", and sets the Page model values $title and $srcPath.

Please note this page is designed for extending by Page subclasses and will not be auto mapped as the template name "border-template.htm" does not match the Pages class name BorderPage.
